name: PSW_LOPA_SIL_Ver_Calcs_SRS_FTP SB GES Not None
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(PSW_LOPA_SIL_Ver_Calcs_SRS_FTP:[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(PSW_LOPA+SIL_Ver_calcs+SRS+FTP_Scope)*>,Yes)){<* Eval(((8*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Documents_Sent_by_Customer)*>+16+0.25*<*VALUE(High Severity Scenarios in PHA Report (1-99999))*>+24+2*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_LOPAs)*>+16+0.1*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_LOPAs)*>+8*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Document_Reviews_(1-5))*>+0.1*(<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_LOPAs)*>*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Document_Reviews_(1-5))*>)*0.25+2*(16+0.25*<*VALUE(PSW_Number of SIFs)*>+8*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Document_Reviews_(1-5))*>+0.1*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Document_Reviews_(1-5))*>*<*VALUE(PSW_Number of SIFs)*>*0.25)+16+0.1*(<*VALUE(PSW_Number of SIFs)*>+<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_non-SIF_IPLs)*>)+8*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Document_Reviews_(1-5))*>+0.1*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Document_Reviews_(1-5))*>*(<*VALUE(PSW_Number of SIFs)*>+<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_non-SIF_IPLs)*>)*0.25)*0.9)*1.1) *>}{0}[ENDIF])*>
